column3: This is correct code, tbh I see no point in changing this. Fix your tool instead.

Fair enough. Just found that there is already an [issue](https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/CPP-11513) for CLion.\nOther users, who are affected by this, can use this PR as workaround until the issue is fixed in CLion.
Please submit those changes upstream as well
The modified line is not part of the upstream tinyformat.h but of the Bitcoin Core additions (see comment in line 1055)
